short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: fx(hash) website cleanup utility -- because art is a matter of taste

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helps you curate your https://www.fxhash.xyz experience by setting up a blacklist of projects and artist. 
Simply pick a card, select if you want to blacklist either the artist or the collection, which will then be hidden from view.
You can consult and remove items from the list as well as import/export/merge lists.
